#Download from SRA i fastq format:
#Create folder for each BioProject, go to folder, and run (only for Projects not already there!): 

#PRJNA1024059 (v)
for i in SRR26323846 SRR26323845 SRR26323844 SRR26323843 SRR26323823 SRR26323841 SRR26323840 SRR26323839 SRR26323838 SRR26323837 SRR26323836 SRR26323835 SRR26323834 SRR26323833 SRR26323832 SRR26323831 SRR26323830 SRR26323829 SRR26323828 SRR26323827 SRR26323826 SRR26323825 SRR26323824 SRR26323822 SRR26323821 SRR26323820 SRR26323819 SRR26323818 SRR26323817 SRR26323816 SRR26323815 SRR26323814 SRR26323803 SRR26323792 SRR26323791 SRR26323790 SRR26323789 SRR26323788 SRR26323787 SRR26323842 SRR26323813 SRR26323812 SRR26323811 SRR26323810 SRR26323809 SRR26323808 SRR26323807 SRR26323806 SRR26323805 SRR26323804 SRR26323802 SRR26323801 SRR26323800 SRR26323799 SRR26323798 SRR26323797 SRR26323796 SRR26323795 SRR26323794 SRR26323793; do fastq-dump --split-files $i; done

#PRJNA493726 (v)
for i in SRR7943982 SRR7943983 SRR7943984 SRR7943985 SRR7943986 SRR7943987 SRR7943988 SRR7943989 SRR7943990 SRR7943991 SRR7943992 SRR7943993 SRR7943994 SRR7943995 SRR7943996 SRR7943997 SRR7943998 SRR7943999 SRR7944000 SRR7944001 SRR7944002 SRR7944003 SRR7944004 SRR7944005 SRR7944006 SRR7944007 SRR7944008 SRR7944009 SRR7944010 SRR7944011 SRR7944012 SRR7944013 SRR7944014 SRR7944015 SRR7944016 SRR7944017 SRR7944018 SRR7944019 SRR7944020 SRR7944021 SRR7944022 SRR7944023 SRR7944024 SRR7944025 SRR7944026 SRR7944027 SRR7944028 SRR7944029 SRR7944030 SRR7944031 SRR7944032 SRR7944033 SRR7944034 SRR7944035 SRR7944036 SRR7944037 SRR7944038 SRR7944039 SRR7944040 SRR7944041 SRR7944042 SRR7944043 SRR7944044 SRR7944045 SRR7944046 SRR7944047 SRR7944048 SRR7944049 SRR7944050 SRR7944051 SRR7944052 SRR7944053 SRR7944054 SRR7944055 SRR7944056 SRR7944057 SRR7944058 SRR7944059 SRR7944060 SRR7944061 SRR7944062 SRR7944063; do fastq-dump --split-files $i; done
gzip *.fastq

#Rename Projects with different _1, _2: PRJNA877434, PRJNA904086, PRJNA892439, PRJNA493726
mmv '*_1.fastq.gz' '#1_3.fastq.gz'
mmv '*_2.fastq.gz' '#1_1.fastq.gz'
mmv '*_3.fastq.gz' '#1_2.fastq.gz'
